record.properties: Height = 300 Width = 363 DoCreate = .T. Caption = "Catálogo de Condiciones de Pago" lagregarvistas = .F. formabusqueda = calias = Name = "Catmsl1" Marco.Name = "Marco" Pags.ErasePage = .T. Pags.Page1.Name = "Page1" Pags.ActivePage = 0 Pags.Top = 50 Pags.Left = 80 Pags.Width = 323 Pags.Height = 42 Pags.Name = "Pags" Grid1.Column1.Header1.Name = "Header1" Grid1.Column1.Text1.Name = "Text1" Grid1.Column1.Name = "Column1" Grid1.Height = 210 Grid1.Left = 22 Grid1.Top = 70 Grid1.Width = 318 Grid1.Name = "Grid1" Agregar.Name = "Agregar" Modificar.Name = "Modificar" Eliminar.Name = "Eliminar" Excel.Name = "Excel" Buscar.Name = "Buscar" Imprimir.Visible = .F. Imprimir.Name = "Imprimir" cerrar.Visible = .F. cerrar.Name = "cerrar"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Init If not opendbf ('formapago','numformp') Return .F. EndIf
*SELE maquina *SET RELATION TO numplanta INTO plantas, numcc INTO costoprd *GO BOTT
sele FormaPago This.cAlias = 'FormaPago' This.cCatName = 'CatFormP' This.FormaCatalogo = 'FormaPago' This.Formabusqueda = 'BusFormP' This.cAnchos = '30|170|75|40' This.cTitulos = 'Clave|Descripción|Desc. Corta|Status' This.cExprs = 'FormaPago.NumFormP|FormaPago.Desc|FormaPago.DesCorta|Iif(FormaPago.Status = 1, "Activo", "Inactivo")' ENDPROC
